title: bundled.md
summary: This document is titled "bundled.md" and contains an introduction section with a cards component. The cards component includes information about three different development platforms: Android, iOS, and Desktop. Each card has a title, content, image, and URL. The Android card has a title of "Android" and a URL of "android.md". The iOS card has a title of "iOS" and a URL of "iOS.md". The Desktop card has a title of "Desktop" and a URL of "mobile.md".
